profile.name: HashiCorp
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer at Robinhood | Infrastructure Management Expert
profile.summary: Results-driven software engineer with a passion for infrastructure management tools. Proven track record of delivering scalable and reliable solutions.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer, Robinhood
description: Designed and implemented a microservices-based architecture for Nomad, resulting in a 30% increase in application performance.
Developed and maintained Consul clusters to ensure high availability and scalability of critical systems.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to integrate Terraform into the company's CI/CD pipeline, streamlining deployment processes.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed and maintained open-source projects on GitHub, including a popular Terraform plugin.
Provided infrastructure consulting services to clients, helping them optimize their cloud infrastructure for cost savings and performance.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Contributed to the development of Nomad, Consul, and Vault, ensuring the stability and security of these critical infrastructure tools.
Mentored junior developers on best practices for infrastructure management and automation.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed custom solutions using Terraform, Boundary, and Vault to meet the unique needs of clients.
Participated in hackathons and coding challenges to stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices.
